DATA: lt_periodos TYPE TABLE OF piqperid,
DATA: lt_facultades TYPE TABLE OF hrobjid,
DATA lo_nd_act_docen_nodo TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
IF lv_ano IS NOT INITIAL AND <fs_periodo> IS NOT INITIAL. "asegurar que año y periodo esten (obligatorios)
* IF lv_tipodoc IS NOT INITIAL AND lv_docid IS NOT INITIAL. "borrar
DATA lt_docentes_pre TYPE TABLE OF zstr_read_docentes.
DATA lt_docentes TYPE TABLE OF zstr_read_docentes.
DATA wa_docentes LIKE LINE OF lt_docentes.
APPEND LINES OF lt_docentes_pre TO lt_docentes.
DELETE ADJACENT DUPLICATES FROM lt_docentes COMPARING num_id.
*AQUI SE FILTRA EN CASO DE NUM ID Y TIPO ID
DATA lt_investigacion TYPE TABLE OF zedu_pd_movinv.
SELECT * FROM zedu_pd_movinv INTO TABLE lt_investigacion
READ TABLE lt_salida1 INTO wa_salida1 INDEX 1.
CONCATENATE wa_docentes-apellidos wa_docentes-nombres INTO wa_alv-nom_docente SEPARATED BY space.
"parte pertenece grupo inv y nom grupo inv
SELECT SINGLE * FROM zedu_pd_grupoin INTO wa_zedu_pd_grupoin
* navigate from <CONTEXT> to <ACT_DOCEN_NODO> via lead selection
ELSE. "primer if si año o facultad vacio
"ESTE CASO ES CUANDO LOS OBLIGATORIOS NO SON INGRESADOS
DATA lo_cmp_usage TYPE REF TO if_wd_component_usage.

DATA lt_valueset TYPE WDY_KEY_VALUE_TABLE. "PARA AYUDA DE BUSQ
DATA wa_valueset like LINE OF LT_VALUESET.
SELECT PERYR FROM T7PIQYEAR INTO TABLE lt_valueset.
DATA: lr_value TYPE REF TO data.

WD_THIS->M_HANDLER->ADD_PARAMETER_FIELD( I_ID = 'ID_ANO' i_read_only = read_only i_value = lr_value i_obligatory = abap_true it_value_set = lt_valueset )." I_READ_ONLY = READ_ONLY I_DESCRIPTION = 'Nombre' it_value_set = lt_valueset ).
SELECT PERID PERIT INTO TABLE lt_valueset FROM T7PIQPERIODT
* create a range table that consists of this new data element
* add a new field to the selection

WD_THIS->M_HANDLER->ADD_SELECTION_FIELD( I_ID = 'ID_PERIODO' IT_RESULT = LT_RANGE_TABLE I_READ_ONLY = READ_ONLY I_DESCRIPTION = 'Periodo' i_obligatory = abap_true it_value_set = lt_valueset i_complex_restrictions = i_complex_restrictions
DATA: ti_hrp1222 TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ty_hrp1222.
DATA: ti_hrt1222 TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ty_hrt1222.
DATA: ti_hrp1222_acum TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ty_hrp1222.
DATA: wa_hrp1222 LIKE LINE OF ti_hrp1222.
DATA: wa_hrt1222 LIKE LINE OF ti_hrt1222.
DATA: wa_hrp1222_acum LIKE LINE OF ti_hrp1222_acum.
DATA: gc_attrib_fac TYPE om_attrib VALUE 'ZLSM_O'. "" Filtro para Facultad
DATA: gc_low_fac TYPE om_attrib VALUE '001'. "" Filtro para Facultad
DATA: full_table_t554t TYPE TABLE OF ZDEDU_CONS_FACULTAD.
"" Cargamos datos en Tabla HRP1222 para consulta de O - TABNR -> Facultades
INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF TABLE ti_hrp1222
""" Cargamos datos en Tabla HRT1222 para Consulta de TABNR de Facultad
INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF TABLE ti_hrt1222
AND ( low = '009' OR low = '001' ). "Adicionado por solicitud del funcional Cesar Sánchez
"" Si la consulta de HRT1222 trae resultados entonces encontramos los datos para hacer filtro en HRP1222
READ TABLE ti_hrp1222 INTO wa_hrp1222 WITH KEY tabnr = wa_hrt1222-tabnr.
"" Si la tabla HRP1222 queda cargada con los datos encontrados se hace consulta en Infotipo HRP1000
** INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF TABLE ti_edu_cons_facultad
INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF TABLE full_table_t554t

WD_THIS->M_HANDLER->ADD_SELECTION_FIELD( I_ID = 'ID_FACULTAD' IT_RESULT = LT_RANGE_TABLE I_READ_ONLY = READ_ONLY I_DESCRIPTION = 'Facultad' it_value_set = lt_valueset i_complex_restrictions = i_complex_restrictions i_use_complex_restriction = 'X'
SELECT ICTYP ICTXT INTO TABLE lt_valueset FROM T5R06
DATA: lr_tipo_doc TYPE REF TO data.
WD_THIS->M_HANDLER->ADD_PARAMETER_FIELD( I_ID = 'ID_TIPO_DOC' i_read_only = read_only i_value = lr_tipo_doc it_value_set = lt_valueset I_DESCRIPTION = 'Tipo documento' ).

DATA lt_select_list TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF lty_stru_list.
SELECT i~icnum n~vorna n~nachn INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF TABLE lt_select_list
DELETE ADJACENT DUPLICATES FROM lt_select_list COMPARING icnum.
CONCATENATE wa_select_list-nachn wa_select_list-vorna INTO lv_nombre SEPARATED BY space.

WD_THIS->M_HANDLER->ADD_PARAMETER_FIELD( I_ID = 'ID_DOC' i_read_only = read_only i_value = lr_id_doc I_DESCRIPTION = 'ID documento' it_value_set = lt_valueset ).
